name: MASH: Halloween Edition
description:
THE ORIGINAL MASH GAME FOR IPHONE & IPOD TOUCH, NOW IN HALLOWEEN EDITION!

MASH (Mansion, Apartment, Shack, House) is the game that tells your future, like where you'll live, who you'll marry, and more.

But this time is different. This time MASH will tell you one of several stories, and you'll choose what to dress up as for Halloween, and who your love interest will be, what kind of candy you'll eat, and the type of weapon you'll use to battle a terrible monster!

Play it with your friends!

Easy to pick up and play.

Draw a spiral and watch MASH determine your story! Or, if you're feeling brave, let MASH choose.
